doctor.name: Assoc. Prof. Dr. Rowshan Ara
doctor.degree: MBBS, FCPS (Gynae & Obs), FCPS (Reproductive Endocrinology & Infertility)
doctor.specialty: Infertlity, Obstetrics, Gynaecology & Reproductive  Endrocrinology SpecialistGynaecological, Laparoscopic & Hysteroscopic Surgeon
doctor.info: Assoc. Prof. Dr. Rowshan Ara is a highly skilled infertility, obstetrics, gynecology, and reproductive endocrinology specialist with expertise in advanced fertility treatments and women’s health. Holding an MBBS, FCPS (Gynae & Obs), and FCPS in Reproductive Endocrinology & Infertility, she serves as an Associate Professor of Reproductive Endocrinology & Infertility at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. She specializes in treating female infertility, polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS), endometriosis, recurrent pregnancy loss, hormonal disorders, and high-risk pregnancies. As a proficient gynecological, laparoscopic, and hysteroscopic surgeon, she provides advanced surgical solutions for reproductive health conditions. Dr. Rowshan Ara is available for consultation at Ibn Sina Infertility Care, Dhanmondi, from 6 PM to 9 PM (Closed: Friday). Book an appointment today for expert fertility and gynecological care.

doctor.info: Dr. Umme Tahmina Shima is an Infertility and IVF specialist, laparoscopic and hysteroscopic surgeon in Dhaka. She holds MBBS (DMC), FCPS (Gynae & Obs), and FCPS (Reproductive Endocrinology and Infertility) qualifications, and currently serves as a Consultant in the Department of Gynecology and Obstetrics at Mugda Medical College & Hospital. She provides consultation at Lumina IVF & Fertility Center Ltd, located at Firoz Tower (Lift-10), 152 Panthapath, Dhanmondi, Dhaka, with visiting hours from 4pm to 8pm on Sunday, Tuesday, and Thursday.

chamber.address: Firoz Tower (Lift-10), 152, Panthapath, Dhanmondi, Dhaka
